Lubbock.name: Restoration Empowerment Center Shelter for Women and Children
The Salvation Army South Plains Texas
Lubbock.description: Clients may stay 30 nights. Extensions are available on a case by case basis after the client has met with a case worker. Mail box and voicemail service is available. The family apartment style rooms also have laundry and shower facilities. Eligibility: Homeless men, women and families. Walk Ins Accepted Hours: 24 hours a day, 365 days a year. Soup kitchen hours: Mondays through Fridays: Breakfast 6:00 am-6:45 am, Lunch 11:00 am-11:45 am, Dinner at 5:00 pm-5:45 pm Saturdays, Sundays: Breakfast 6:00 am-6:45 am, Lunch 11:00 am- 11:45 am, Dinner at 5:00 pm-5:45 pm Complete list of SOCIAL SERVICES at Salvation Army Lubbock Emergency Shelter Feeding Program Rapid-Rehousing Rent and Utility Assistance Food Vouchers Clothing Vouchers Hygiene Kits Cooling and Warming Stations Public Showers

Lubbock.name: Family Promise of Lubbock
Lubbock.description: Family Promise of Lubbock offers temporary shelter and support to homeless families with children. Our guests are committed to seeking employment and saving their income to achieve sustainable housing. Family Promise provides shelter through an Interfaith Hospitality Network.Family Promise of Lubbock's mission is to provide homeless families with children the tools necessary to achieve long term financial, parental and personal self-sufficiency through a comprehensive program of temporary housing, case management and supportive services.
